text: Candice Bergen (born May 9, 1946) is an American actress. In 1980, she was nominated for an Academy Award for "Best Actress in a Supporting Role" for her role in Starting Over. Bergen later acted as the title character in Murphy Brown. (1988-98, 2018-present). ==Other websites== * Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Beverly Hills, California Category:1946 births Category:Living people
title: Candice Bergen
